name: resexg
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: mpan(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cres(c0, c2), universe), wss(cres(c0, c2), c0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cres(c0, c2), universe))
-| wss(cres(c0, c2), c0)
-| wi(wa(wss(cres(c0, c2), c0), wcel(c0, c1)), wcel(cres(c0, c2), universe))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cres(c0, c2), universe))
-| wss(cres(c0, c2), c0)
-| wi(wa(wss(cres(c0, c2), c0), wcel(c0, c1)), wcel(cres(c0, c2), universe))

|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cres(c0, c2), universe))
-| wi(wa(wss(cres(c0, c2), c0), wcel(c0, c1)), wcel(cres(c0, c2), universe))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wss(cres(c0, c2), c0), wcel(c0, c1)), wcel(cres(c0, c2), universe))

comment: The restriction of a set is a set. (Contributed by NM, 28-Mar-1998.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)
